item.title: Brownfield Application Development in .NET: Book Review
item.description: The Book Brownfield Application Development in .NET by Kyle Baley and Donald Belcham The Review I asked to be sent this book to review by Manning as I was quite intrigued to see how well it would complement Michael Feather’s Working Effectively with Legacy Code, the other book I’m aware of which covers approaches to dealing with non green field applications. What did I learn?
